description: Abstract class supporting an observation.  Has the properties of ObservationType but excludes holding and features.

observationDate.description: UTC Date (required) and time (optional) the observation was taken

phenomenonStartTime.description: ISO UTC DateTime. The start time of the phenomenon being observed.

phenomenonEndTime.description: ISO UTC DateTime.  The end time of the phenomenon being observed.

responsible.description: Identifier of the person responsible for the observation
